synopsis.text: Takada, a red-haired, enigmatic newcomer, arrives in a quaint Japanese countryside town, stirring up curiosity and intrigue among the local schoolchildren. Nicknamed 'Matasaburou the Wind Imp' by his classmates, after a local legend and the uncanny breeze that accompanies his arrival, he quickly becomes the center of attention. As friendships blossom and adventures unfold, the youngsters spend idyllic days exploring the rural landscape together. However, when a gusty wind sweeps Matasaburou back to the city, his classmates are left to ponder the mysterious connection between their friend and the legendary wind imp. Directed by Rin Taro, this visually captivating OVA features a unique storybook style, complete with bold angles, striking compositions, and artistic sound effects, all set against a backdrop of vibrant colors and cardboard cut-out-like figures.
